title: Account recorvering
body:
So my account has been stolen by my friend who knew the password. He changed the summoner name and im pretty sure he changed the verification email too.
I made this account about 3 years ago.
I tried submitting a request to Riot games, and it would ask all sorts of questions like - 
What was the first 3 champions you bought?
What is your account signup email?

Ofcourse i don't remember any of this.
Maybe i can find some of the first purchases made on my old credit cards, but it will take hours.
I have now used 3 hours of my life trying to recover the account, with no luck.

What to do?

replies.body: Your best bet for recovering that account is going to be taking some time to look over those questions. They're designing so that nobody but the original account creator (the one who consistently played on the account) could possibly remember the answers.
